snippet: Financial regulators are expected to prohibit traders from betting on the outcome of the 2012 election, according to people briefed on the matter, dealing a blow to Wall Street's recent attempts to profit from politics.
abstract: Financial regulators are expected to prohibit traders from betting on the outcome of the 2012 election, according to people briefed on the matter, dealing a blow to Wall Street's recent attempts to profit from politics.

headline.main: One Derivatives Trade That's Now Off: Betting on the 2012 Election
